titles.title: The Kingdom Of God Is Not Of Meat

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The kingdom of God is not of meat, (echo)
The kingdom of God is not of drink, (echo)
But of righteousness and peace, (echo)
Fullness of joy in the Holy Ghost. (echo)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This is the mystery of the overcomer:
Christ in you, the hope of glory;
Let us make up our mind
And seek all the fullness of God
For of His Kingdom there shall be no end.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith (x2)
Rooted and grounded in the love of God (x2)
That ye be filled with the fullness of God (x2)
According to the power that worketh in us (x2)
